import Skill from "../Skills/Skill" function JobCard(props) { const getSkill=(skill)=>{ props.onGetSkill(skill) } return (
{props.data.company}
{props.data.new ? New! : ''} {props.data.featured ? Featured : ''}
{props.data.position}
{props.data.postedAt} . {props.data.contract} . {props.data.location}
) } export default JobCard
